channel.title: JavaScript auf Nicky Reinert
channel.description: Blog & projects by Nicky Reinert (Institute for Digital Challenges): web development & software development, SEO & analytics, hosting & DevOps, WordPress & Hugo, tools & projects, data protection & digital culture — plus content on AI and autism & society.

item.title: Advent of Code - Day 6 - Walking the map (JavaScript)
item.description: (task | solution) This task looks tricky, so I am once again choosing a simple language that I am familiar with: JavaScript (which, by the way, was developed in just 10 days). With no further ado…

media:content.media:title: Advent of Code - Day 6 - Walking the map (JavaScript)

item.dc:subject: Lesezeit: 5 Minuten
